scripts.test:e2e: CYPRESS_USER_EMAIL="${CYPRESS_USER_EMAIL}" CYPRESS_USER_PASSWORD="${CYPRESS_USER_PASSWORD}" pnpm exec start-server-and-test 'pnpm run dev' http://localhost:3000 'pnpm exec cypress run'
scripts.test:e2e:open: CYPRESS_USER_EMAIL="${CYPRESS_USER_EMAIL}" CYPRESS_USER_PASSWORD="${CYPRESS_USER_PASSWORD}" pnpm exec start-server-and-test 'pnpm run dev' http://localhost:3000 'pnpm exec cypress open'
scripts.test:e2e:debug: CYPRESS_USER_EMAIL="${CYPRESS_USER_EMAIL}" CYPRESS_USER_PASSWORD="${CYPRESS_USER_PASSWORD}" pnpm exec start-server-and-test 'pnpm run dev' http://localhost:3000 'pnpm exec cypress run --spec="cypress/e2e/debug-login.cy.js"'
scripts.test:integration: pnpm exec start-server-and-test 'pnpm run dev' http://localhost:3000 'pnpm run test:unit'
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm exec start-server-and-test 'pnpm run dev' http://localhost:3000 'pnpm exec cypress run --headless'
